programme.title: Untuk Angeline
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri terpaksa menyerahkan bayi perempuan mereka kepada pasangan lain kerana tidak mampu untuk membiayai kos perubatan hospital semasa bayi itu dilahirkan . Anak perempuan itu sangat disayangi oleh bapa angkatnya sehingga dicemburui oleh abang angkat dan ibu angkatnya . Namun setelah bapa angkatnya meninggal dunia, kanak-kanak perempuan itu mula dilayan dengan buruk oleh ibu angkatnya.(n)

programme.title: Sengketa Cinta
programme.desc: Seorang pemuda telah ditipu dalam perniagaan . Untuk membalas dendam dia mencolek seorang wanita dalam usaha untuk menjejak penipu itu. Bagaimanapun akhirnya dia jatuh cinta dengan wanita tersebut lalu membawa balik menemui ibubapanya.(n)

programme.title: The Unmarried Wife
programme.desc: Dilema seorang wanita yang kerjaya yang di curang kan oleh suaminya berkali-kali. Wanita itu bertekat untuk meneruskan hidup tanpa suaminya. bertemu dengan seorang lelaki yang dia tidak tahu sejarah hitang lelaki tersebut. dalam masa yang sama sumainya cuba untuk mendapatkan semula hatinya.(n)

programme.title: Tmo Salam Cinta
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Salam Cinta.(n)

programme.title: Forest In Love
programme.desc: Dua orang jejaka tergesa-gesa hendak berkahwin. Mereka berdua saling menyintai sepasang adik beradik dari keluarga yang berada. Lantaran itu, percintaan kedua-dua jejaka tersebut tidak dipersetujui oleh ayah kepada kedua gadis tersebut.(n)

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda.(n)

programme.title: Kolam Cinta
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Zairi, seorang kaki pancing. Selalu memancing di kolam ikan siakap. Kesan luka hati yang menyusuk hatinya membuatkan dia lebih gemar bersendirian di samping melayan anaknya, Aiman.(n)

programme.title: Juvana
programme.desc: Daim iaitu bekas tahanan juvana Wira Bakti yang meneruskan persekolahannya di sebuah sekolah telah dibuli dan dimalukan oleh sekumpulan pelajar yang diketuai oleh Adam.Setelah Sekolah Wira Bakti diarahkan penutupannya 6 orang rakan-rakan Daim telah dipindahkan ke Sekolah Indera Sakti..(n)

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda.(n)

programme.title: Pontianak Menjerit
programme.desc: Seorang jutawan telah mewasiatkan kepada peguamnya supaya mencari waris-warisnya yang berhak menerima harta bernilai lebih dari RM30 juta. Semua waris disyaratkan supaya berada di bangalo arwah di sebuah bukit peranginan selama 33 hari bagi melayakkan mereka mewarisi harta pusaka tersebut.(n)

programme.title: Tmo Minyak Dagu
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Minyak Dagu.(n)

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda.(n)

programme.title: My Stupid Boss
programme.desc: Seorang perempuan indonesia datang ke kuala lumpur mengikut suaminya. Setelah berada di kuala lumpur dia berhasrat untuk bekerja di syarikat milik rakan suaminya. Majikannya itu merupakan seorang yang memiliki sikap dan perangai yang membuatnya sentiasa berada dalam keadaan serba salah dan tertekan. Sikap majikannya yang tidak mahu membayar hutang, menuduhnya mengambil wang syarikat dan tidak membayar gaji menyebabkan dia nekad untuk berhenti kerja. Namun kisah berakhir apabila dia bersetuju untuk bekerja semula apabila majikannya memintanya menguruskan kerja-kerja kebajikan membaiki rumah anak yatim.(n)

programme.title: Ah How Putus Cinta
programme.desc: sepasang suami isteri yang membuka sebuah restoran makanan laut Cina halal dilanda masalah apabila ketua tukang masaknya menghilangkan diri selepas putus cinta dengan kekasihnya.(n)

programme.title: Gang Preed
programme.desc: Kisah pelajar sekolah menengah yang sangat meminati filem seram. Mo adalah pengarah dan juga mengetuai kumpulan kecil ini. Suatu hari Mo terserempak dengan Prang, seorang gadis misteri yang dipindahkan dari sekolah lain. Mo memberitahu rakan-rakannya bahawa dia benar-benar mahukan dia sebagai peneraju filem baharunya. Masalah antara pembuat filem yang buruk dan gadis pelik bermula, bersama dengan persahabatan dan cinta yang mula mekar tanpa mereka sedari.(n)

programme.title: Jom Wayang S13
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang.(n)

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda.(n)

programme.title: Kumpulan O
programme.desc: sekumpulan saintis yang berjaya mencipta formula bagi menggantikan minyak petrol untuk menjalankan kereta tetapi kejayaan mereka terbatas apabila formula tersebut telah dikesan dan di curi oleh kumpulan penjahat.(n)

programme.title: Kidnap
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki berjanji dengan teman wanitanya bahawa dia akan bersamanya pada hari lahirnya iaitu dua hari kemudian. Kemudian pada petang itu semasa berhenti untuk minum di sebuah bar, dia tersilap diculik kerana menyerupai anak seorang jutawan.(n)

programme.title: Pang Pokok Ketapang
programme.desc: Kisah kehidupan punkers berjumpa dengan musafir di bulan Ramadan. Pemuda berusia 21 tahun bernama Irfan atau Pang yang tinggal bersama ibu, serta 5 beradik di sebuah kawasan perumahan murah. Oleh kerana adik beradik ramai dan rumah sempit, Pang banyak habiskan masa di tempat kerjanya, sebuah kedai cuci kereta Pokok Ketapang.(n)

programme.title: Reza, Arman & Bill
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Reza seorang pemuda yang gilakan bola sepak. Namun setelah dia cedera, yang mana kecederaan itu telah disengajakan oleh musuhnya, Arman, dia tidak mampu untuk bermain lagi. Perasaan untuk terus bermain bola juga lenyap, apatah lagi selalu diganggu oleh Arman dan rakan-rakan yang mengatakan dia seorang kaki bangku.(n)

programme.title: Senja Merah
programme.desc: Mahmud, seorang taikun yang berkahwin dengan seorang janda yang mempunyai seorang anak lelaki, Zubaidah adalah pengusaha restoran. Baharum, anak kepada zubaidah berkawan dengan Mahmud anak angkat Mira sejak kecil. Apabila dewasa, hubungan mereka semakin kuat dan mereka saling menyayangi. Maher, bimbang harta peninggalan bapanya akan jatuh ke tangan mereka berdua.(n)

programme.title: Soul'S Code
programme.desc: Penemuan mayat seorang gadis remaja pelajar sekolah menengah dalam keadaan telanjang dengan tanda pelik di dahinya, tanda itu untuk menghalang rohnya keluar untuk membalas dendam. Detektif Khan dari DSI ditugaskan untuk menyiasat kes itu.(n)

programme.title: NCIS S19

programme.title: NCIS S19
programme.desc: The Wake - A gruesome mishap at a Navy petty officer’s gender-reveal party leads NCIS to the case of a missing teacher that was popularized on a true crime podcast.(n)

programme.title: NCIS S19
programme.desc: Starting Over - NCIS investigates the apparent suicide of a retired Navy officer who was in Palmer and Knight’s grief group. Also, Torres gets a call from NCIS Special Agent Jane Tennant to come to Hawai’i when she gets a lead on a witness from a case they worked on together.(n)

programme.title: NCIS S19
programme.desc: Last Dance - When an infamous arms dealer, Reymundo Dia, is released from prison and bodies start piling up, Torres is forced to face the repercussions of his actions during an undercover operation he worked on years ago.(n)

programme.title: NCIS S19

programme.title: NCIS S19
programme.desc: All Or Nothing - NCIS investigates the unexpected death of a Navy reservist who was an investigative journalist. Also, Knight and Jimmy’s budding romance is put on hold when a vital organ transfer goes fatally wrong.(n)

programme.title: NCIS S19
programme.desc: Birds Of A Feather - When Agent Parker is framed for murder, the team puts their jobs and lives on the line in order to buy time and uncover the truth, on the 19th season finale.(n)

programme.title: NCIS S19

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3
programme.desc: Tiny Problems - When Jack is disappointed with the popcorn maker he orders, he and the students plot revenge; Helen goes back to school to get her high school degree and chaos ensues in Principal Durbin's office in her absence.(n)

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3
programme.desc: Disgraced - Mr. Pugh plans a field trip for the Toledo chapter of the Ohio Naturalists; when Jack can't write his own book, he agrees to be ghostwrite for popular author Robin Shwank -- only to insert his own chapters into Shwank's book.(n)

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3
programme.desc: Gary Meets Dave - Jack accidentally loses a significant amount of money and it falls in the hands of the students; as Principal Durbin and Helen investigate who stole the money, the students and teachers admit to other wrongdoings.(n)

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3
programme.desc: Get Hoppy - Principle Durbin turns into a power-hungry maniac after self-publishing Jack's philosophy book.(n)

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3
programme.desc: Mr. Pistachio - Jack has Mary drive him to the doctor, but a prank results in him getting the same procedure twice; at school, Durbin and Helen embarrass themselves and the kids compete over class superlative titles.(n)

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3
programme.desc: That That That - As the school prepares for winter break, Jack tries to record a lecture as a way into the University of Wisconsin's philosophy department; frustrated and unable to finish the video, he falls asleep and has nightmares.(n)

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3
programme.desc: Aces Wild - Helen has a vaping problem to overcome with the help of Durbin while Anthony's secret is revealed.(n)

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3
programme.desc: Katie Holmes Day - While the rest of the town prepares for the celebration of Toledo's annual Katie Holmes Day, Jack and Marissa plot to ruin the holiday pageant.(n)

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4
programme.desc: Tornado! - A tornado puts the school on lockdown and Helen believes it's coming specifically for her. The kids pass the time by writing fan fiction, "shipping" various combinations of faculty members.(n)

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4
programme.desc: Sweatpants - Jack has the students form a fake cult to sabotage Principal Durbin's new school uniforms. Mary, Stef and Michelle prepare to see one of their favorite artists who is in town to perform.(n)

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4
programme.desc: An Oath To Rusty - Jack attempts to get closer with the guys at work by inviting them over for a game night. Helen helps Principal Durbin grow a backbone. Stef and Mary try to coax information out of Michelle about a court case.(n)

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4
programme.desc: Tons Of Rue - When the A.P. Bio students reunite Jack with his deadbeat dad, Jack plots revenge by trying to expose his allegedly reformed father. A witch foretells of a grim future for Mary, Stef and Michelle that divides the women.(n)

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4
programme.desc: The Perfect Date From Hell - When Jack discovers his new girlfriend's therapy homework requires dating him, he turns the tables on her. Principal Durbin goes undercover to determine which faculty member is most worthy of a very special prize.(n)

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4
programme.desc: Love, For Lack Of A Better Term - Victor attempts to catch up to his peers and become a man by sending Ashlanda a risqué photo. Grace and Anthony try to "Parent Trap" Mary and Principal Durbin after overhearing a conversation on single adults.(n)

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4
programme.desc: Malachi - When Jack's girlfriend says she's going to dinner with a male friend, a jealous Jack tags along. Principal Durbin, Mary, Stef and Michelle take Helen out to cheer her up after a breakup.(n)

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4
programme.desc: The Harvard Pen - Jack is enraged to find that the A.P. Bio students have stolen his beloved Harvard pen after he asked them not to touch it. Principal Durbin and Helen repeatedly fail the superintendent's inspections.(n)

programme.title: Battle In Seattle

programme.title: Road To UFC
programme.desc: ROAD TO UFC is a ground-breaking “win and advance” tournament that gives top MMA prospects from Asia a pathway to a UFC contract. Eight mixed martial arts athletes will compete in each of four men’s weight classes: flyweight, bantamweight, featherweight and lightweight. The opening round is divided into four episodes, each of which includes four tournament bouts and one additional non-tournament bout. These non-tournament bouts are included for promising prospects whose divisions might not have been included in ROAD TO UFC.(n)

Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.(n)

programme.title: Road To UFC
programme.desc: ROAD TO UFC is a ground-breaking “win and advance” tournament that gives top MMA prospects from Asia a pathway to a UFC contract. Eight mixed martial arts athletes will compete in each of four men’s weight classes: flyweight, bantamweight, featherweight and lightweight. The opening round is divided into four episodes, each of which includes four tournament bouts and one additional non-tournament bout. These non-tournament bouts are included for promising prospects whose divisions might not have been included in ROAD TO UFC.(n)

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - In the Extreme
programme.desc: Follow a host of sharks with extraordinary abilities that allow them to thrive in the most adverse conditions around the globe. Observe nearly blind Greenland sharks made for life in freezing Arctic waters, and another species that can walk on land.(n)

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Origin Stories
programme.desc: Get acquainted with an array of ocean oddballs and learn how billions of years’ worth of changes, from ice ages to asteroid strikes, have shaped their looks and skills. Meet blind worms who fish, walking sharks, tree-climbing crabs, and much more.(n)

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Allies and Adversaries
programme.desc: Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earth’s oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.(n)

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - The Next Generation
programme.desc: Channel your inner sci-fi fan and explore the bizarre mating rituals of the ocean’s most peculiar creatures. Learn how bloody battles for mates, gender bending and supersize litters of babies just might secure a next generation for these animals.(n)

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - The Coast
programme.desc: Travel to coastlines around the world, where conflict over food and accommodation leads to desperate battles for survival. Watch as penguins’ delightful dispositions turn toward murderous rage, and join a humpback whale trying to protect her calf.(n)

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Costa Rica - Shark Defenders
programme.desc: The Pacific coast of Costa Rica is a biodiversity hotspot that hosts nearly 5,000 species of marine life. But here in this undersea jungle, the ocean’s top predator is at risk. Discover how marine defenders are teaming up to save the shark.(n)

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ultimate Predator
programme.desc: Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its prey’s heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.(n)

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ocean Voyagers
programme.desc: Navigate the ocean’s vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.(n)

programme.desc: Join two seriously ill orangutans in the medical clinic, where Erik’s head infection is causing concern and fourteen-year-old Mia’s life depends on a blood transfusion. Outside the clinic, the infants find a secret treat hidden inside a rubber tree.(n)

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Canada
programme.desc: Canada, where summer is short and time is tight – any time is the right time to fight. The mighty North provides the setting for bison, bald eagles, and polar bears to wage some of the most heavy-duty fighting in the animal kingdom.(n)

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Surrogate Families
programme.desc: Most baby animals have a mother to raise them and show them how to succeed in the wild. Mammals are particularly dependent on their moms. In this episode of Baby Animals we’ll meet four different species of babies that are being raised by humans and who h.(n)

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Herd Mentality
programme.desc: Many species of animals are adapted to live in large groups. The group gives them protection from predators, helps them find food and offers plenty of social contact. In this episode of Baby Animals we explore what’s it like to grow up in some of these gr.(n)

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - The Power of Playtime
programme.desc: Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.(n)

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - Born to Be Different
programme.desc: This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a duck that won’t go in the water without a ride from her pooch pal, an elephant that thinks she’s a buffalo, and a herd of cows that adopt an orphaned deer.(n)

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - A Friend in Need
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends including Charlotte, a schnauzer who enjoys bath time with her guinea pig pal Wallace, and a randy ram called Hamish who likes to sneak off to live with a herd of dairy cows instead of his own kind.(n)

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - The Young Ones
programme.desc: In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.(n)

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - How to Catch a Lizard
programme.desc: Tag along as Dr. Amanda rescues a blind pet baboon, and watch Dr. Charlotte’s tricky surgery on a pangolin whose leg must be amputated after a run-in with poachers. Later, chase a rhino, two young baboons gone AWOL, and a fiesty monitor lizard.(n)

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - An Island Home
programme.desc: Face a tough decision when Esti’s leg infection puts the brakes on this young duiker’s release. Then track and collar a young lion with Dr. Amanda; check on an ailing bush baby; and greet the noisy new addition to the center, a grumpy grey parrot.(n)

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Walking with a Pangolin
programme.desc: Crush a busy day with the team as they release rehabbed pythons, teach a pangolin how to hunt, and round up a troop of vervet monkeys. Search for a missing bird of prey with Dr. Charlotte, while Dr. Amanda helps a bushpig savaged by poachers’ dogs.(n)

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Tsiba's New Mum
programme.desc: Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelope’s tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.(n)

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - A Pangolin's Plight
programme.desc: Feel heartbreak when Dr. Amanda’s team loses a pangolin abused by wildlife traffickers, but cheer when another is released post-rehab. Check on a trio of hedgehogs and tag along as the center’s baboons and nyala antelopes get a change of scenery.(n)

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Winter
programme.desc: Be an eyewitness to the death and resurrection that winter brings to Africa. Observe what comes with shorter days, from drought conditions to frigid winds, and marvel at the survival skills of animals and plants as they face the season’s fury.(n)

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.(n)

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.(n)

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Herd Mentality
programme.desc: Many species of animals are adapted to live in large groups. The group gives them protection from predators, helps them find food and offers plenty of social contact. In this episode of Baby Animals we explore what’s it like to grow up in some of these gr.(n)

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Endangered Species
programme.desc: With seven of Ontario’s eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow and not entirely smart, which means they keep taking a beating - from predators, and from cars.(n)

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Joined at the Hip
programme.desc: The animal kingdom can be a harsh place, but some baby animals have a family ready to take care of their needs. Meet some of these adorable babies and their clans: a koala joey, European elk twins, a litter of Asian short-clawed otters, and black howler m.(n)

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - Rules of the Game
programme.desc: Young hyenas compete in tug of war, mischievous parrots play at picking apart tourists’ cars, and Atlantic spotted dolphins enjoy sophisticated social games amid seaweed—all following specific rules that hone social bonds.(n)

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - Beast Buddies
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, an animal shelter puppy that helps a captive cheetah cub get ready for the wild, and an injured monkey who wins over a pack of unfriendly dogs and a lonely mongoose that enjoys foraging with a flock of sheep.(n)

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - Creature Comforts
programme.desc: This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a troop of rescue center monkeys that have adopted a litter of stray kittens, a loyal dog helping a rescued raccoon overcome her fears, and an emu raised by Irish setters.(n)

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - To the Rescue
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, including “ranch manager” Barclay, a Great Dane who happens to be a gifted horse whisperer. In Africa, a tiny marmoset called Thor has become obsessed with two young rescued mongooses.(n)

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Into the Heat
programme.desc: Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clan’s symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkat’s alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.(n)

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Pushed to the Limits
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkat’s strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.(n)

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - The Fickle River
programme.desc: Travel to Samburu, where matriarch Anastasia turns her elephant herd north after a local river dries up. Then, in Naboisho, see cheetah mom Kuleta evade a crafty pack of hyenas. Later, in Laikipia, check in on wild dog Phoenix and her new litter.(n)

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Blood and Dust
programme.desc: Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuleta’s loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.(n)

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: There is an endless variety of sleep-strategies among animals, yet it seems a universal behavior. But why bother with sleep at all? How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that.(n)

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: Get a front-row seat to the planet’s biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africa’s east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.(n)

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Behind the Lens
programme.desc: Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the region’s species. Observe as they monitor behavior, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.(n)

programme.title: Kingdom of the Tide
programme.desc: Low tide exposes a band of shore called the intertidal zone. It’s a place of stunning extremes, attacked by hurricane force waves and exposed to baking heat. Creatures here have evolved in countless bizarre ways. Scientists explore this alien realm.(n)

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Locals call it the ‘arribada’, or ‘arrival’. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching.(n)

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Ugly Cute
programme.desc: Not all baby animals are cute. Often, quirky physical traits are evolutionary adaptations that have helped a species survive. Visit four funny-looking youngsters, including a Baird tapir, two baby gelada baboons, an anteater and a Bactrian camel.(n)

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Primate Families
programme.desc: The sprawling primate family includes animals as different as monkeys, lemurs and humans. Follow primate babies to see how they bond with their mothers, learn to socialize, and adapt to an ever-changing environment.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Invasion Begins
programme.desc: When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.(n)

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Bald is Beautiful
programme.desc: After a terrible accident at the nursery forest school, life changes drastically for nine-month-old Alejandra. And at forest school, the students enjoy a poolside classroom where Valentino proves he’s much more than just a class clown.(n)

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - An Island Home
programme.desc: Face a tough decision when Esti’s leg infection puts the brakes on this young duiker’s release. Then track and collar a young lion with Dr. Amanda; check on an ailing bush baby; and greet the noisy new addition to the center, a grumpy grey parrot.(n)

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Pushed to the Limits
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkat’s strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.(n)

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Meet the Packs
programme.desc: Connect with the three packs: the large Manzi pack in the lush heartland, the Kakuli pack in the Badlands, and the tiny Stork Colony pack living at the park’s edge. Follow Julz as he shares their victories and defeats in this make-or-break season.(n)

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - A Close Encounter
programme.desc: Feel the heat as rising temps mean that water is getting scarce. The Manzi pack must stand alongside predators to hydrate at a remaining precious water spot. Hunt with Weka’s pack to feed the pups, and watch the Stork Colony thrive against all odds.(n)

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Stork Pack in Trouble
programme.desc: Agonize over a lost Stork pack puppy, and tussle with Manzi pups who are sorting their place in the hierarchy, figuring out noisy-neighbor friends and foes. Hop on a search mission with Julz for the missing Kakuli pack in the desolate Badlands.(n)

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Big Cats, Big Trouble
programme.desc: Dodge a leopard with the Manzi dogs while they treat themselves to a stolen feast. No such luck for the Kakuli pack on the hunt, as they’re foiled by a brave puku antelope. Find the stork pack, and retreat from charging elephants with Jules and Simon.(n)

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - The Lost Boy
programme.desc: Film a wild dog hunt with Julz as he catches up with the Manzi pack at a kill, and watch for leopards and hyenas as the Kakuli pack takes great risks while waiting for the rains to come. Go on an epic hunt with a returning male of the Stork Colony.(n)

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Here Comes the Rain
programme.desc: Welcome the rains as an emotional Julz says farewell to the dog packs. He discovers the Stork Colony pups hunting guinea fowl, and is heartened to find the Kakuli pups feeding on an antelope carcass. The playful Manzi pack corner a tough warthog.(n)

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - An Island Home

programme.desc: The Serengeti plains echo the sound of two million wildebeest. Over the course of the year, the giant herd migrates from the north to the south and back again in an endless circle. Watch the most treacherous part of the migration—the crossing of the Mara.(n)

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - South America
programme.desc: From the Amazon to the Andes, South America has some beautiful scenery. From guanacos sparring over grassland, to marine iguanas head-butting over a beachhead, to home-stealing hermit crabs, the quest for real estate causes a lot of conflict.(n)

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Southeast Asia
programme.desc: With real-life dueling dragons, giant sumo-wrestling beetles, street-fighting monkeys, and sea turtles that play king of the hill – on top of another sea turtle, Southeast Asia boasts a wide range of wildlife warriors.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Strength in Sisterhood
programme.desc: The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomad’s brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.(n)

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - The Road to Recovery
programme.desc: Beni and Lala get an unexpected visit from Vet Arga, Kesi makes a new friend on Bangamat Island, and Alejandra deals with a new view of the world after the accident at forest school leaves her blind in one eye.(n)

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Walking with a Pangolin

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Bound By Blood
programme.desc: The southwest corner of New Zealand’s South Island is hemmed in by giant mountains and the rough Pacific Ocean. Rare penguins are locked in a daily game of cat and mouse with giant New Zealand sea lions. The sea lions also live in a tumultuous world, wher.(n)

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Life in Dark Water
programme.desc: In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river,.(n)

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Age of Independence
programme.desc: The south-eastern coast of New Zealand are some of the richest fishing grounds in the world – the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults. Young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society,.(n)

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Walking with a Pangolin
programme.desc: Crush a busy day with the team as they release rehabbed pythons, teach a pangolin how to hunt, and round up a troop of vervet monkeys. Search for a missing bird of prey with Dr. Charlotte, while Dr. Amanda helps a bushpig savaged by poachers’ dogs.(n)

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Return to the Mara
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and Safari guide Jean Du Plessis is in the south of the Serengeti plains to witness the largest mass birth on the planet. Every year on the short grass plains, the wildebeest migration stops for weeks while the females give birth. Then the.(n)

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - South America
programme.desc: From the Amazon to the Andes, South America has some beautiful scenery. From guanacos sparring over grassland, to marine iguanas head-butting over a beachhead, to home-stealing hermit crabs, the quest for real estate causes a lot of conflict.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Strength in Sisterhood
programme.desc: The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomad’s brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.(n)

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - The Road to Recovery
programme.desc: Beni and Lala get an unexpected visit from Vet Arga, Kesi makes a new friend on Bangamat Island, and Alejandra deals with a new view of the world after the accident at forest school leaves her blind in one eye.(n)

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Southeast Asia
programme.desc: With real-life dueling dragons, giant sumo-wrestling beetles, street-fighting monkeys, and sea turtles that play king of the hill – on top of another sea turtle, Southeast Asia boasts a wide range of wildlife warriors.(n)

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - USA
programme.desc: The USA is big on flash and spectacle. Bighorn rams rattle the mountaintops. Brown bears battle, desperate to fatten up for winter. Sharp-tailed grouse shake their tail-feathers on the dance floor. Wild stallions rumble with beauty and grace.(n)

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Europe
programme.desc: From the Highlands to the Alps, Europe’s evocative landscapes are the backdrop for epic wildlife drama. Normally stoic red deer go wild during the rut. Wolf packs clash over territory, and foxes do the foxtrot - it’s not as nice as it sounds.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Punks on the Run
programme.desc: The lions of the Nomad pride rampage deep into the heart of the MK pride’s territory, scattering its members and coming dangerously close to the five new MK cubs. Meanwhile, the Hollywoods are recovering, and Ava’s survival skills are still intact.(n)

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Outbreak!
programme.desc: The race is on to find Tulia and Zalipa, who are missing from Palas Island. And after months of convalescence, Beni returns to forest school but faces another setback at the milk bucket. Meanwhile, the vets keep a close eye on pregnant Dilla.(n)

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Tsiba's New Mum
programme.desc: Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelope’s tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.(n)

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Blood and Dust
programme.desc: Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuleta’s loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.(n)

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Origin Stories
programme.desc: Get acquainted with an array of ocean oddballs and learn how billions of years’ worth of changes, from ice ages to asteroid strikes, have shaped their looks and skills. Meet blind worms who fish, walking sharks, tree-climbing crabs, and much more.(n)

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Allies and Adversaries
programme.desc: Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earth’s oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.(n)

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - The Next Generation
programme.desc: Channel your inner sci-fi fan and explore the bizarre mating rituals of the ocean’s most peculiar creatures. Learn how bloody battles for mates, gender bending and supersize litters of babies just might secure a next generation for these animals.(n)

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Tsiba's New Mum
programme.desc: Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelope’s tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.(n)

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Ngorongoro
programme.desc: Explores the Ngorogoro’s highlands and caldera on the edge of the Serengeti. The caldera is a wildlife haven that some have called a modern day Eden because of the density and diversity of its wildlife. That includes some of the last of Africa’s “tuskers.(n)

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - South Africa
programme.desc: Wildebeest battle for herd hierarchy, meerkats live the thug life, floppy fish fight it out on land and locusts give up their vegetarian ways in a frenzy of cannibalism. It all happens on the wild and wide-open landscape of South Africa.(n)

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Sub Sahara
programme.desc: The latitudes south of the Sahara offer vastly different battlegrounds for a wide range of warriors. Male giraffes swing their heads like wrecking balls, zebras boast the most powerful kick in the animal kingdom, and chimpanzee warfare is eerily familiar.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Punks Strike Back
programme.desc: After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.(n)

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Dilla and Delilah
programme.desc: The fate of several graduates awaits the next round of wild releases. Meanwhile, runaway Zalipa is found, but her partner in crime, Tulia, is still missing. And Baby Clarita has a complete meltdown as the vets perform surgery on her mother.(n)

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - A Pangolin's Plight
programme.desc: Feel heartbreak when Dr. Amanda’s team loses a pangolin abused by wildlife traffickers, but cheer when another is released post-rehab. Check on a trio of hedgehogs and tag along as the center’s baboons and nyala antelopes get a change of scenery.(n)

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: There is an endless variety of sleep-strategies among animals, yet it seems a universal behavior. But why bother with sleep at all? How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that.(n)

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - City of Riches
programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Family’s lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who’s eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.(n)

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Home Away from Home
programme.desc: Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.(n)

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - A Busy Bay
programme.desc: Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.(n)

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - A Pangolin's Plight
programme.desc: Feel heartbreak when Dr. Amanda’s team loses a pangolin abused by wildlife traffickers, but cheer when another is released post-rehab. Check on a trio of hedgehogs and tag along as the center’s baboons and nyala antelopes get a change of scenery.(n)

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Snows of Kilimanjaro
programme.desc: Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.(n)

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Meet the Packs
programme.desc: Connect with the three packs: the large Manzi pack in the lush heartland, the Kakuli pack in the Badlands, and the tiny Stork Colony pack living at the park’s edge. Follow Julz as he shares their victories and defeats in this make-or-break season.(n)

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - A Close Encounter
programme.desc: Feel the heat as rising temps mean that water is getting scarce. The Manzi pack must stand alongside predators to hydrate at a remaining precious water spot. Hunt with Weka’s pack to feed the pups, and watch the Stork Colony thrive against all odds.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Hollywoods Held Hostage
programme.desc: During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.(n)

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Born to Be Wild
programme.desc: Trouble brews when the team makes the final attempt to reunite reluctant mother Dilla with her new baby Delilah. And Alba, the world’s only known albino orangutan, amazes her friends with her unique approach to termite foraging.(n)

programme.title: Don't Mess With Klara
programme.desc: Klara is a gifted cyber-agent who enjoys keeping both her professional and personal life under strict control. When her boyfriend suddenly breaks up with her for a new girl, she uses her skills to sabotage their relationship with hilarious consequences.(n)

programme.title: Sebbe
programme.desc: Sebbe is fifteen. He never planned to build a bomb but now, he has one in his hands. Growing up poor and with a single mother, life had always been difficult. The junkyard soon became his place of refuge where he could detach himself from the world.(n)

programme.title: Dr Abel: Bruised And Battered
programme.desc: Multiple mutilated women with the words, ‘Respectez Asia’, carved on their skin, have been discovered. Coroner Dr. Abel believes that the suspect in question is innocent and strives to uncover the twisted family tragedy behind the slayings.(n)

programme.title: Playmaker
programme.desc: A former footballer and jailbird, Ivo is no longer interested in football. That is until he meets Lukas, a talented young player, and decides to help him pursue a professional career. But his criminal past soon catches up with him.(n)

programme.title: Jirga
programme.desc: In this bracingly raw film about vindication and grace, an Australian ex-soldier goes to Afghanistan to seek absolution from the family of a civilian he had killed in the war. And it will be the 10 year old son of the deceased who will decide his fate.(n)

programme.title: Blackbird
programme.desc: Sean, a rebellious teenager, is falsely accused of planning a school massacre. He must survive a harrowing conflict with a prison gang leader while he attempts to prove his innocence to the community and those close to him.(n)

programme.title: Murder On Omaha Beach
programme.desc: An American veteran is found tied to a pole in his uniform on a landing beach, allegedly executed “as an example”. Captain Eloise has to overcome personal grievances and work with her estranged father, a WWII expert, on the perplexing case.(n)

programme.title: To Live To Sing
programme.desc: Zhao Li is the manager of a small Sichuan Opera troupe. When their theater risks getting demolished, she desperately tries to find a new venue. Soon, the line between her bleak reality and the colorful fantasy of opera starts to magically blur.(n)

programme.title: Don't Mess With Klara
programme.desc: Klara is a gifted cyber-agent who enjoys keeping both her professional and personal life under strict control. When her boyfriend suddenly breaks up with her for a new girl, she uses her skills to sabotage their relationship with hilarious consequences.(n)

programme.title: The Startup
programme.desc: A true story of Matteo Achilli, an 18 year-old boy, who designs an innovative job-searching app. Though response is initially lacklustre, he perseveres. Soon enough, his app brings him immense popularity and wealth. But success comes with a hefty price.(n)

programme.title: Dr Abel: Bruised And Battered
programme.desc: Multiple mutilated women with the words, ‘Respectez Asia’, carved on their skin, have been discovered. Coroner Dr. Abel believes that the suspect in question is innocent and strives to uncover the twisted family tragedy behind the slayings.(n)

programme.title: Blackbird
programme.desc: Sean, a rebellious teenager, is falsely accused of planning a school massacre. He must survive a harrowing conflict with a prison gang leader while he attempts to prove his innocence to the community and those close to him.(n)

programme.title: Lessons of a Dream
programme.desc: Koch, a young Englishman teacher, tries to change a strict German boys school’s archaic ways and prejudiced views of the English with unconventional methods. A battle ensues between his detractors who want him out and his students who adore him.(n)

programme.title: Jirga
programme.desc: In this bracingly raw film about vindication and grace, an Australian ex-soldier goes to Afghanistan to seek absolution from the family of a civilian he had killed in the war. And it will be the 10 year old son of the deceased who will decide his fate.(n)

programme.title: Modern Murder: The Nest
programme.desc: Gorniak is critically injured when her new colleague, Winkle, fumbles during a mission. Winkler narrows down the killer to two men but Gorniak is the only one who recognises the perpetrator. Her life remains in danger as long as the killer walks free.(n)

programme.title: To Live To Sing
programme.desc: Zhao Li is the manager of a small Sichuan Opera troupe. When their theater risks getting demolished, she desperately tries to find a new venue. Soon, the line between her bleak reality and the colorful fantasy of opera starts to magically blur.(n)

programme.title: Dr Abel: Broken
programme.desc: When a young woman is murdered in a ‘dark room’ of a Berlin club, Dr. Abel realises a depraved international sex trafficking ring is on his hands. However, the case becomes personal for Abel when his own children vanish in another ‘dark room’ murder.(n)

programme.title: Nursery Rhymes
programme.desc: Through nursery rhymes and the politics of language, we see a childhood spent under Japanese Imperial rule in 1940s Singapore.(n)

programme.title: Murder On Omaha Beach
programme.desc: An American veteran is found tied to a pole in his uniform on a landing beach, allegedly executed “as an example”. Captain Eloise has to overcome personal grievances and work with her estranged father, a WWII expert, on the perplexing case.(n)

programme.title: Another Love
programme.desc: After losing her husband Michi in an accident two years ago, physiotherapist Julika starts a relationship with the easy-going bicycle city guide Konstantin. With Konstantin, life is full of lightness and adventure again, but is it really love?(n)

programme.title: Run To You
programme.desc: Gianni is a serial seducer, but his life is destined to change when he meets Chiara, a beautiful woman who has had an accident and is paraplegic.(n)

programme.title: King Of The Belgians
programme.desc: King Nicolas II of the Belgians is on a state visit to Istanbul when his country falls apart. With a solar storm shutting down air travel and communications, he must travel by road across the Balkans to save his country.(n)

programme.title: 7 Hours To Win Your Heart
programme.desc: When Giulio’s fiancée cheats on him right before their wedding, the newly singled Giulio decides to attend classes to win back his fiancée taught by Valeria, a beautiful and determined relationship coach disillusioned with love.(n)

programme.title: Men Do What They Can
programme.desc: Paul is a bachelor and a charming womanizer. But his life takes an abrupt turn when he falls deeply in love with Iris, an engaged woman. With the help of his best guy pals and his Rottweiler dog, he goes all out to woo her with hilarious consequences.(n)

programme.title: Run To You
programme.desc: Gianni is a serial seducer, but his life is destined to change when he meets Chiara, a beautiful woman who has had an accident and is paraplegic.(n)

programme.title: Modern Murder: Nemesis
programme.desc: When a famous restaurateur is murdered, Gorniak and Hennrichs delve into the world of organised crime. However, investigations lead them to a darker and more frightening possibility – his wife and children. Could a young boy murder his father?(n)

programme.title: King Of The Belgians
programme.desc: King Nicolas II of the Belgians is on a state visit to Istanbul when his country falls apart. With a solar storm shutting down air travel and communications, he must travel by road across the Balkans to save his country.(n)

programme.title: 7 Wishes
programme.desc: Marina loses her passport on the eve of her wedding. When she fails to locate it, she takes to her last resort: a wish marathon. She asks the Universe for seven wishes and soon realises that the best blessings come in disguise.(n)

programme.title: Love Suddenly
programme.desc: Still hung up on his teenage sweetheart Marie, Jakob sets out to win her back. However, she is under the mistaken impression that he is more successful than he actually is. Soon, Jakob finds himself in a web of lies he cannot escape from.(n)

programme.title: 7 Hours To Win Your Heart

programme.title: Indian Horse
programme.desc: Saul Indian Horse is an indigenous man who was forcefully removed from his family when he was a young boy. Placed in a strict boarding school, he struggles to find peace with his life. He eventually finds salvation in the unlikeliest of places – hockey.(n)

programme.title: Suraya
programme.desc: Caught between the desire to dance and the expectations put on her by family through religious beliefs, a young ballerina named Suraya must decide if she can play the lead in a current production.(n)

programme.title: Who Framed Santa Claus?
programme.desc: Wonderfast, a highly successful online delivery company, enjoys great business all year around except during Christmas. Despite attempts to sabotage Santa Claus, their efforts produce unexpected results. Will the Christmas spirit prevail after all?(n)

programme.title: Kokowaah
programme.desc: Henry gets a second chance at success and love when he is hired to co-write a screenplay with his ex-girlfriend. But when a little girl turns up at his door claiming to be his daughter from a one-night stand 8 years ago, everything changes forever.(n)
